item.title: Kookaburra Sits in the Old Gum Tree Ukulele Play Along (in A) - Key of A - ukeplayalongs
Pure Heart - How Can I Get Over - Key of A - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song How Can I Get Over by Pure Heart from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Bm7, D.

item.title: Michael Bublé - I Believe in You - Keys of A, G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song I Believe in You by Michael Bublé from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, Am, Bm7, C, Cm, Csus2, D, E, Em, F♯m, G.

item.title: George Harrison - Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea - Keys of F, A - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Between the Devil and the Deep Blue Sea by George Harrison from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A, Bdim7, Bm, B♭, B♭m, C7, Caug, C♯7, Dm, Dm7, E7, E♭, F, F7, F♯m, G, Gm.

item.description: Play along video for the song Saint Patrick's Day Song by The Kiboomers from the channel Daniel Simmons. Chords used in the song: A, G.
